latestUpdates.title: Over 4,000 citizens sign up for Home Quarantine squads.
latestUpdates.subTitle: If they are not found at home, they are booked for violating norms by the flying squad, which includes the police too.

latestUpdates.title: Citizen squads to watch the quarantined.
latestUpdates.subTitle: Karnataka has requested citizen groups and members of non-profit organisations to be part of squads..
